body:
So if you were thinking what to do right now I will give a presentation at the [Radiance](https://www.facebook.com/RadianceSimulation?directed_target_id=0) International Workshops about [‪#‎Parametric‬](https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/parametric)[‪#‎environmentalAnalysis‬](https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/environmentalanalysis) with a taste of [LadyBug](https://www.facebook.com/LadyBugforGrasshopper?directed_target_id=0) and [‪#‎Honeybee‬](https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/honeybee) in 10 minutes or so!



If you are interested to know about the process of putting the Ladybug together, what's going on right now and what's coming next, just check the workshop website for webcast information! Here: [http://www.nrel.gov/buildings/2013_radiance_workshop.html](http://www.nrel.gov/buildings/2013_radiance_workshop.html)



Cheers,

Mostapha
topic: Parametric Environmental Analysis with taste of Ladybug + Honeybee!

replies.body:
In case you missed the presentation, here are the presentation slides:

[https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1wexas-XWMWaQdEVpOmPP8oVTR3D...](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1wexas-XWMWaQdEVpOmPP8oVTR3D2xRhNtLAw7M-UzsA/edit#slide=id.p)



Check this link for more presentations from the workshop: [http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2013-golden-co](http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2013-golden-co)
